items.text: beautiful delivery! Full on off stump and Ervine shoulders his arms. But the ball straightened oh-so-slightly, eventually going just over the top of off stump
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven on the up, but can't breach the infield. Straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, turns away after pitching, punched off the back foot to mid off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: full on off stump, strides forward and defends back to Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, but it's the quicker one! Angling into Mire, who tries to cut late, but it's too close to him. Goes just past off stump. Very close to the second wicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, spins away, smacked off the back foot to cover point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, turned off his hips as the ball races down the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, 1 run

items.preText: Sawan: "On other note, the confidence we saw in Fizz and Sunzmul today, we dont see that among our tail enders. Some good batting training sessions in the net came in handy today as noted by Shakib during the innings break!"
items.text: full on off stump, shuffles across to the off side and drives past the non-striker to mid on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, no run

items.text: full outside off, tries to drive past cover but comes off the bat's toe end. Trickles away towards the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle and leg, clipped off his hips to midwicket for a quick run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, 1 run

items.preText: Adam Theofilato: "Ervine owes Zimbabwe a big innings, Last 5 matches in all formats he has scored 2, 2, 0, 4 and 23. Not ideal for your number 3 batsman."
items.text: full on off stump, tapped down the ground to mid off for a quick single. It's dangerous, but the fielder misses the direct hit. He would've been out if the throw hit the stumps
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: in the air, but falls beyond Rubel! Full outside off, and tries to lift this over the infield. The bat turned in his hand, thereby popping the ball up. Mid off chased behind it, but just not quick enough. Living dangerously, Mire
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, angling into him and pulled over midwicket. Only a single as the ball goes to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, Mire tries to slog sweep over midwicket, but misses. Well taken by the keeper
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: on a good length outside off, tapped towards the off side after coming forward
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, goes deep into the crease and pulls in front of the wicket. Straight to mid on, who forces the batsmen to turn down the single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, muscled back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: you miss, I hit! Slow and loopy on middle stump. Mire tries to slog this far too early, and plays through even before the ball got to him. Sneaks under his bat, and crashes into middle stump
items.postText: Simgwat: "If Solomon Mire is going to have a long career he needs to learn temperament, his application especially rotating the strike and his choices"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, OUT

dismissal.text: SF Mire  b Shakib Al Hasan 7 (22b 0x4 0x6) SR: 31.81

items.text: on a hat-trick! Gone first ball! Full on middle stump, but Taylor's gone back instead of coming forward. Misses the flick off his pads, and the ball raps him on the pads. Impact in front of the stumps, and Taylor's walking back. Easy lbw decision for the umpire. Taylor's horrid form continues
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, OUT

dismissal.text: BRM Taylor lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText: Shakib will be on a hat-trick when he returns for the next over. Here's Mashrafe for his fourth over
items.text: full on off stump, and that's beautifully driven past the non-striker. Firmly hit, and mid off has no chance either. Textbook shot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, FOUR runs

items.preText: Inteser: "If I read his lips correctly, shakib was saying "Ball haat theke chute gese" after the mire wicket which means the ball slipped out of my hands....which is why everyone was laughing so much!!"
items.text: good length outside off stump, tries to defend but takes the shoulder of his bat. Flies away towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover. Sharp stop from the fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, driven square off the front foot past cover point. There's protection in the deep, though
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, walks across to the off side before defending towards mid on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run
